protocol.name: P-GSE21705-2
protocol.text: Plants were grown for 14 days under short days conditions

protocol.name: P-GSE21705-3
protocol.text: Total RNA (10-7 Î¼g) was extracted with the RNeasy RNA isolation kit (Qiagen)

protocol.name: P-GSE21705-6
protocol.text: Arrays were scanned using Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G using standard affymetrix protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE21705-7
protocol.text: Signal values were obtained and normalized with the GC-RMA protocol using R 2.7.2 and Bioconductor 2.2. Genes with expression value lower than log2(10) were removed.
